home.title: Physiotherapy Ingo Pauls - Physiotherapy in Diekirch
home.description: Welcome to Physiotherapy Ingo Pauls in Diekirch. We offer professional physiotherapy for sustainable pain relief and mobility.

hero.title: Physiotherapy
hero.subtitle: Since 2005, we have been supporting you with modern, specialized physiotherapy for orthopedic, neurological, post-operative and sports-related conditions ‚Äì competent and always up to date with the latest scientific knowledge.

team.title: Get to know the team
team.subtitle: For us, the person is at the center. Our team is committed to relieving your pain and improving your health in the long term.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: In addition to classic physiotherapy, we offer the following services:

omt.title: Manual Therapy according to S.O.M.T
omt.description: Manual therapy is a method concerned with diagnosing and treating functional disorders of joints, muscles and nerves and their pathological consequences. Helps with:
bullets: Joint blockages and resulting pain
Restricted movement

stosswelle.title: Shockwave Therapy
stosswelle.description: Radial shockwave therapy is a non-invasive method in which high-energy pressure waves are directed from outside onto painful areas of the body to stimulate self-healing processes and loosen hardenings such as calcifications. Helps with:
bullets: Heel spur
Tendon problems such as inflammation and calcifications
Hypertonic muscles
Myofascial syndromes

dry-needling.title: Dry Needling
dry-needling.description: Dry needling is a special physiotherapy technique in which a thin, sterile acupuncture needle is inserted directly into cramped muscle areas, so-called trigger points. This releases adhesions in the fascia and improves oxygen supply to tense muscle fibers. Helps with:
bullets: Muscle pain
Muscle tension
Tendon problems

faszien.title: Fascial Therapy
faszien.description: Fascial therapy is an umbrella term for manual techniques that treat connective tissue (fascia) to release adhesions, increase elasticity, relieve pain and improve freedom of movement. Helps with:
bullets: Chronic muscle complaints
Sports injuries
Post-operative complaints
Reduced joint mobility

ivrt.title: Dizziness Therapy according to IVRT
ivrt.description: The vestibular system includes parts of the inner ear and brain that process information involved in balance control and eye movements. If a disease or injury damages these information-processing areas, a vestibular disorder can arise. It can also develop for unknown reasons. Helps with:
bullets: Vertigo caused by disorders of the vestibular system
Balance problems

cmd.title: Craniomandibular Dysfunction (CMD)
cmd.description: Craniomandibular dysfunction is an umbrella term for painful dysfunctions of the masticatory system, in which the interaction between the temporomandibular joint, chewing muscles, teeth and often the cervical spine is disturbed. This can lead to symptoms such as headaches, facial and ear pain, jaw clicking, tinnitus, dizziness or back complaints, and is often triggered by stress or teeth grinding. Helps with:
bullets: Pain caused by temporomandibular joint dysfunction
Reduced jaw mobility

lymph.title: Manual Lymphatic Drainage and Complex Decongestive Therapy
lymph.description: Manual lymphatic drainage is a special type of medical massage that stimulates the transport of lymph fluid in the lymph vessels through gentle manual techniques. Helps with:
bullets: Primary lymphedema (malformations in the lymphatic vessel system)
Secondary lymphedema (e.g., due to surgical procedures, radiation, etc.)
Phlebedema
Lipedema and lipo-lymphedema

training.title: Medical Exercise Therapy
training.description: Medical exercise therapy is a targeted, therapeutically supervised conditioning program that strengthens strength, endurance and coordination to restore or improve physical performance for everyday life and sports after injuries, operations or in chronic conditions. Our practice has a well-equipped training room, and our training program is individually tailored to improve each person‚Äôs specific complaints. Helps with:
bullets: Muscle atrophy (muscle wasting)
Weakness of the cardiovascular system
Loss of coordination & balance

physikalisch.title: Physical Therapy
physikalisch.description: Physical therapy includes treatments that use physical influences such as pressure, heat, cold or electricity to act on the body. The main goals of physical therapy are pain relief, promoting blood circulation and metabolic activity, as well as maintaining and improving mobility and muscle strength. Our practice offers deep heat via high-frequency electrotherapy, ultrasound devices, electrical stimulation, and deep oscillation therapy. Helps with:
bullets: Tendon problems such as inflammation and calcifications
Muscle tension

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Here you can see a few of our Google reviews.

1.text: (Translated) I have been in treatment with this extremely competent, friendly, always helpful and solution-oriented team for many years üòÄ Even with regard to my specific health case, they are always looking for efficient, tailored solutions and treatment models. Thank you very much for your great work üòÄ
1.name: Sabrina G.

2.text: (Translated) I have been going there for two weeks‚Äîand will continue for a longer time‚Äîin order to get fit again. Two qualified physiotherapists with a lot of know-how. Spacious premises, no cubicles but individual rooms. The technical equipment is powerful and state-of-the-art; efficient application is guaranteed thanks to the therapists‚Äô expertise.
2.name: Marc W.

3.text: (Translated) Very satisfied! Ingo Pauls and his colleague do excellent work, and they do it with a lot of wit, humor and friendliness! I‚Äôm already looking forward to seeing them again! Very competent! üëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
3.name: Mariette S.

houseVisit.title: Home visit
houseVisit.text: If a visit to the practice is not possible for various reasons, a home visit can be arranged.

page.title: Cookie Policy
page.intro: This website uses cookies and similar technologies. Necessary cookies are required for the operation of the site. External content (e.g. Google Maps) is only loaded after consent.
page.necessaryText: Ensure basic functions such as language settings and site operation.
page.externalText: Embeds such as Google Maps. Data (e.g. IP address) may be transferred to third parties.
page.analyticsText: Only used if enabled (e.g. for visitor statistics).
page.manageText: You can change or withdraw your consent at any time.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. This page explains what data may be processed when you visit this website and what rights you have.

logs.title: Server log data

cookies.title: Cookies & consent
cookies.text: We use necessary features (e.g., language settings). External content (e.g., Google Maps) is loaded only after your consent. Your choice is stored locally in your browser (consent status).

external.title: External content (Google Maps)
external.text: If you enable external content, a connection to third-party providers may be established and data (e.g., your IP address) may be transmitted to them.
external.googleMaps: Google Maps (embed/iframe) ‚Äì loaded only after consent.
external.withdraw: You can withdraw or reset your consent at any time via the cookie settings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you contact us by phone or email, we process your information to handle your request. Legal basis: pre-contractual measures/contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) or our legitimate interest in handling requests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

rights.title: Your rights
rights.text: Under the GDPR you have, among others, the following rights:

items.restriction: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
items.withdraw: Withdrawal of consent with effect for the future

cnpd.title: Right to lodge a complaint
cnpd.text: You may lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority. In Luxembourg, the competent authority is the CNPD:
cnpd.name: Commission nationale pour la protection des donn√©es (CNPD)
cnpd.address: 15, Boulevard du Jazz, L-4370 Belvaux, Luxembourg
